pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A color and black and white emoji SVGinOT font built from EmojiOne artwork with support for ZWJ, skin tone diversity and country flags.
The font works in all operating systems, but will currently only show color emoji in Firefox, Thunderbird and other Mozilla Gecko-based applications. This is not a limitation of the font, but of the operating systems and applications. Regular black and white outline emoji are included for backwards/fallback compatibility.
